original_text:
When Isaac was old and his eyes were so weak that he could no longer see, he called for Esau his older son and said to him, “My son.”
“Here I am,” he answered.
korean_text: 이삭이 나이가 많아 눈이 어두워 잘 보지 못하더니 맏아들 에서를 불러 이르되 내 아들아 하매 그가 이르되 내가 여기 있나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: and his eyes were so weak
that he could no longer see
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 볼 수 없게 되자

sentences.original_text: he called for Esau his older son
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 큰 아들 에서를 불렀다
